abstract: Rajat K. Gupta’s lawyers showed the jury an internal Goldman document compiled for Gary D. Cohn, then the bank’s co-president, in preparation for a 2008 meeting he had with Raj Rajaratnam, the head of the Galleon Group hedge fund.
snippet: Rajat K. Gupta’s lawyers showed the jury an internal Goldman document compiled for Gary D. Cohn, then the bank’s co-president, in preparation for a 2008 meeting he had with Raj Rajaratnam, the head of the Galleon Group hedge fund.
lead_paragraph: Wall Street watchers hoped that the inner workings of Goldman Sachs would be on display during the insider trading trial of Rajat K. Gupta, which begins closing arguments on Wednesday.

headline.main: At Gupta Trial, a Glimpse at Goldman’s Inner Workings

abstract: Richard D. Parsons, former chairman of Citigroup and former chief executive of Time Warner, is joining the board of the investment bank.
snippet: Richard D. Parsons, former chairman of Citigroup and former chief executive of Time Warner, is joining the board of the investment bank.
lead_paragraph: One might have thought that after 16 years on the board of Citigroup — and one terrifying financial crisis — Richard D. Parsons would have had his fill of financial firms.
